title: Faith And Aquarium Pumps: The Stuff Of Science In 2014
teaser: It may seem scientists are aloof geniuses who churn out discoveries. Joe Palca's NPR series, Joe's Big Idea, shows us how science really works. He reviews 2014 highlights with NPR's Rachel Martin.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
